law.text:
The annual scholarship award shall be in the amount of:
$2,000 for a full-time undergraduate student, or $1,000 for a part-time undergraduate student, enrolled at a 2-year eligible institution;
$5,000 for a full-time undergraduate or graduate student enrolled in a 4-year eligible institution; or
$2,500 for a part-time undergraduate or graduate student enrolled at a 4-year eligible institution.
